knimeNode.name: R Snippet (Local)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Allows execution of R commands in a local R installation.

fullDescription.intro:
Allows execution of R commands in a local R installation. The result of these R commands is returned in the output table of this node. All input data is written to a CSV file, imported into R (saved in the variable named R) and processed together with the R commands. The result which has to be saved into variable R as well is written to a CSV file again and then imported into KNIME.
More details about R:
http://www.r-project.org/
Short-refcard.pdf
fullDescription.option: Path to the local R executable. Note that it is possible to specify the path to the local R executable also in the R section of the KNIME preferences.
If checked, the specified file is used as R binary. If not checked, the file specified in the KNIME's R preferences is used.

views.view: The text sent to standard error during the execution of R executable as well as the text of the .Rout file generated by R. (If it appears in gray, it's the output of a previously failing run which is preserved for your trouble shooting.)
